meanings.sent1: The stylists at the salon gave me a new haircut.
meanings.sent2: I always go to the same stylists for my hair appointments.
meanings.sent3: The stylists joked that they could turn my hair into a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The stylists' hands moved like paintbrushes as they transformed my hair.
meanings.sent5: The stylists' expertise in hair styling left me feeling confident and refreshed.

meanings.definition: A person who designs or creates fashionable clothing.
meanings.sent1: The stylists at the fashion show showcased their latest designs.
meanings.sent2: Fashion stylists often work closely with clothing designers.
meanings.sent3: The stylists playfully argued over which outfit was the most stylish.
meanings.sent4: The stylists' creations lit up the runway like fireworks.
meanings.sent5: The stylists' fashion sense was evident in every piece they presented.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled in a particular artistic or creative field.
meanings.sent1: The stylists of the art world gathered for a special exhibition.
meanings.sent2: As a stylist of photography, she captured breathtaking moments.
meanings.sent3: The stylists of culinary arts competed in a fierce cooking challenge.
meanings.sent4: The stylists of dance moved with grace and precision on stage.
meanings.sent5: The stylists of storytelling wove captivating tales for their audience.
